articles.title: ‘I’m going to stretch it’: Anxiety over SNAP leads to hard choices
articles.description:
Federal courts in Rhode Island and Massachusetts issued rulings Friday ordering the Trump administration to continue funding SNAP through the government shutdown.

The post ‘I’m going to stretch it’: Anxiety over SNAP leads to hard choices appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal courts ordered continued SNAP funding amid the government shutdown affecting Massachusetts residents.
Massachusetts residents face anxiety over SNAP benefits, with many planning to stretch limited resources.
Local families may struggle with food insecurity as SNAP funding remains uncertain during the shutdown.

articles.title: Mississippi woman kills escaped monkey fearing for her children’s safety
articles.description:
A truck carrying the monkeys overturned Tuesday on Interstate 59 north of Heidelberg, Mississippi.

The post Mississippi woman kills escaped monkey fearing for her children’s safety appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A truck carrying monkeys overturned on November 1 in Mississippi.
A local woman killed an escaped monkey to protect her children.
Residents may face increased concerns about wildlife safety in urban areas.
